translation.intro-text: Uhlelo lwe-DA ServePro lusiza abanikazi bezitolo nabasebenzi ukuthi balandele imisebenzi yokuthengisa ngempumelelo. Ilungele i-F&B, ezitolo kanye nezinsizakalo.
translation.feature3-text: Isifinyezo ezenzakalelayo semali engenayo, ama-oda kanye nezinto ezidayiswa kakhulu
translation.feature4-text: Setha izindima nezimvume ezithile kumsebenzi ngamunye
translation.feature6-text: Ukubethela okungama-2, umnikazi we-akhawunti kuphela ongakwazi ukufinyelela
translation.address: Ikheli: 52 D1 Street, Phuoc Long B, Thu Duc, Idolobha lase-Ho Chi Minh
translation.footer-text: Â© 2025 DA ServePro. Zonke izilungelo zigodliwe
